CustomField.formula: User_Record_Id__r.FirstName + " " + User_Record_Id__r.LastName + BR() + "Title : " + User_Record_Id__r.Title + BR() + "Division : " + User_Record_Id__r.Division + BR() + "Manager : " + User_Record_Id__r.Manager.FirstName + " " + User_Record_Id__r.Manager.LastName
CustomField.label: User Information
